tool_description: Scans live performance databases and venue reporting systems to identify and track live performances of music across concerts, festivals, and other live events.

venue_databases.description: Performance rights organization databases to scan

error_messages: Database connection failed: Unable to access venue databases. Check database credentials and connectivity.
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and within supported historical range.
Search limit exceeded: Maximum 100 artists and 1000 songs per search. Split large searches into multiple calls.
Unsupported territory: Use valid territory codes for search_territories.
Invalid venue type: Use supported venue types like concert_hall, festival, club, arena, theater.
usage: Provide venue_databases, search_territories, artist_names, song_titles, and date range. Optionally filter by venue_types and minimum_attendance to focus on relevant performances.

total_performances.description: Total number of live performances found

performance_records.description: Detailed performance records with venue, date, and attendance information
